property.value: Abel's value cannot be changed in any way.

property.value: Experienced. Jane will not call out an Agency Dude. Noon: Target a Dude controlled by another player at a location you own. Boot Jane to move her to the location and call out the Dude, who cannot refuse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Immediately after your posse wins a shootout round, your shooter for the round gains +1 Influence until after Nightfall next turn.

property.value: Mad Scientist. Horse. Gadget Difficulty: 6 Noon: Boot the Autogyro to move this Dude to another location. Noon: Target another Dude at this Dude's location. Boot the Autogyro to move this Dude and the target Dude to another location.

property.value: Mad Scientist. Bullet. Gadget Difficulty: 5 The Auto-Incendiary Bullets' Ghost Rock cost cannot be lowered. Shootout: Ace Auto-Incendiary Bullets. Ace an opposing Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after Nightfall, the Deed worth the most Control Points in play gains 2 Control Points. If multiple Deeds are tied for the most Control Points, each Deed's pulls for it; the Deed with the lowest pull gains the Control Points. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: The next Dude Aced this turn goes Home booted instead. If multiple Dudes are aced simultaneously, each Dude's controller pulls; the Dude with the lowest pull goes Home booted instead. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. Billy cannot attach Weapons. Shootout: Target an opposing Dude with a Weapon attached. Until the shootout ends, the target cannot be the shooter if another Dude can, and the target's Bullet rating does not contribute to the number of cards Drawn or redrawn by the opposing player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced. 2. Jack is always Wanted. Jack cannot be targeted by an action from a card with 'Judge' in the title. Reaction: When a Cheatin'! card targets your shootout Draw hand, if Jack is in your posse, cancel the card's action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Wanted Dudes gains +1 Influence. Reaction: Immediately before the Upkeep Phase, target one of your Dudes from another Outfit. Lower the Dude's Upkeep cost to 0 until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman. Reaction Spirit 6: When bringing a Dude from another Outfit into play, boot this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, the Dude becomes a member of your Outfit for the rest of the game.

property.value: Noon: Target a Dude in play. Pull. If the pull exceeds the Dude's value, the Dude can be targeted as if he or she were Harrowed, until after Nightfall.

property.value: Shootout: Draw two Draw hands for this shootout, including all card-drawing bonuses. Immediately before hands are revealed, discard one hand. Reveal the other. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may move one of his or her Dudes to the Town Square for a match, ignoring movement restrictions. Each of the Dudes' controllers pulls for the Dude. The Dude (or Dudes) with the highest pull plus Bullet rating gains 5 Ghost Rock for his or her controller. If more than one Dude is in the match, discard the Dude(s) with the lowest pull.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Brewery can only be attached to a Saloon. The Saloon gains +2 Production.

property.name: Text
property.value: Take any Home for your Outfit and place it on your street like a Deed. The Home becomes your new Home. Remove your old Home from play. This Event does not resolve if a copy of it has resolved this game.Ace this card.

If the Dude's value drops below A, Ace the Dude, who goes to Boot Hill and cannot return to play in any way. Discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Stained Glass Windows can only attached to an in-town Deed. During a shootout at this Deed, any player with a Dude in the shootout can, as a Shootout action, throw the fight through the window into the Town Square. Discard the Stained Glass Windows and move both posses to the Town Square, ignoring movement restrictions. Any Dudes at the Town Square can immediately join a posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise each Wanted Dude's Upkeep cost by 1 until Nightfall. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unready all Weapons in play. Weapons cannot be made ready until after Nightfall. Weapons attached this turn are unready. Immediately after Nightfall, each Dude can ready one of his or her Weapons.

property.name: Text
property.value: Huckster. Reaction Hex 4: When one of your Dudes joins a posse, cast this Hex. If this Hex succeeds, another player's card effects cannot remove the Dude from the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: If your highest-value Dude is at the Town Square and the highest-value Dude controlled by another player is at the Town Square or an adjacent location, your Dude issues an unrefusable call-out to the other Dude. The other Dude moves to the Town Square for the shootout, ignoring movement restrictions. No other Dudes can join.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. If ownership of the Storage Shed changes, cards under it go to their owners' discard piles. Owner Noon: If the Storage Shed has fewer than five cards under it, boot it. Place a card under it from your Play hand. Owner Noon: Boot the Storage Shed and discard your Play hand. Take the cards under the Storage Shed for your Play hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. For the rest of the game, the Dude gains +1 Influence. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. For the rest of the game, the Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Controller Noon: Pay 1 Ghost Rock. Until after Nightfall, a Dude at the Tailoring Shop gains +1 Influence. You can take this action any number of times per turn, but only once per Dude per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player must discard a third of his or her Ghost Rock, rounding down any fractions. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target an in-town Deed worth at least 1 Control Point. Boot the Deed. Until a player boots one of his or her Dudes at the Deed as a Noon action, the Deed cannot be unbooted and is worth 0 Control Points. The Deed is considered to have a blank text box, except for its traits which it retains. The Deed's Production or Upkeep cost remains the same.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Drifter's Upkeep cost cannot be reduced or negated by any means.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Fear Level is over 7, gain 1 Control Point until after Nightfall.

property.name: Text
property.value: Until after the Gambling Phase next turn, players cannot play Cheatin'! cards, but each illegal hand revealed is considered the worst possible hand: for lowball, a Dead Man's Hand, and for any other Draw, a non-Flush A,2,3,4,6.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed:2. Reaction: Immediately before a Dude pulls for a Hex or Spirit, raise the Spell's Difficulty by The Missionary's Blessed rating.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: The Pennsylvania Kid cannot be Aced in a shootout if another Dude in his posse can be aced instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Private. Strike. Each non-Terror, non-Blessed Dude at the Seventh-Sign Strike has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and has his or her value lowered by 3. If a Dude's value drops under A at the Seventh-Sign Strike, Ace the Dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot one of your Shamans. Target one of your Sioux Dudes in this shootout. Until the shootout ends, the Dude gains a Bullet bonus equal to the Shaman's Shaman rating. Cancel the bonus if either Dude has a Weapon ready that non-Sioux could attach.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blessed. Noon Miracle 9: If this Blessed is at a Deed and this Miracle succeeds, Ace this card. Discard the Deed.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman:3. Only a Sioux player can bring Thunderbird into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Immediately before a Mad Scientist pulls to create a Weapon Gadget, raise the Gadget Difficulty by 2. If the pull succeeds, the Gadget gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: When you select your shooter for this shootout round, select another Dude in your posse. The Dude's Bullet rating adds to the number of cards you Draw or redraw for this shootout round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination. While the Tomb Guardian is at a location you own, if it has not moved this turn, it gains a +3 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability 'Noon: Target a Dude at this Dude's location. Immediately after the target Dude moves, this Dude can move to the same location as a Reaction. If a different Dude is already this action's target, the Dude is no longer targeted.' Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. The Trading Post's controller can attach Goods to booted Dudes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shaman:1. Two Birds cannot call Spirits with a value greater than 9.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you reveal an illegal shootout Draw hand while Wendigo is in your posse, raise your hand rank by one rank to the worst possible hand of that rank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Controller Noon: Pay 1 Ghost Rock to move a Goods attached to one of your Dudes to another of your booted or unbooted Dudes in play, even if the Dude attaching the Goods is at a location you do not control.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Immediately before Nightfall, White Horse boots to move to a location containing another Dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard the Deed in play worth the most Control Points. If more than one Deed has the most Control Points, each Deed's controller makes a pull for it. Discard the Deed with the highest pull. Ace this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Public. Any Dudes at this location are considered adjacent to all Deeds in town but cannot be called out without a card effect.
